content.raw: The segway.bed.gz files were edited so the headers appear in alphabetical order; this change should not make a difference and the files can still be opened by the UCSC Genome Browser. This change allows for consistent output between Python 2 and Python 3. Because they’re zipped files, the changes will not appear in the pull request below.
